means: 处罚，惩罚( punish的现在分词)

sentence.Network_en: His punishing work schedule had made him resort to drugs.
sentence.Network_cn: 异常紧张的工作安排使他开始吸毒。

sentence.Network_en: There's no mechanism for punishing arms exporters who break the rules.
sentence.Network_cn: 对违规的武器出口商实施惩罚尚无执行机制。

sentence.Network_en: Ms Carey appeared to blame her breakdown on EMI's punishing work schedule.
sentence.Network_cn: 凯丽女士似乎将她的精神崩溃归咎于百代唱片公司高度紧张的工作日程安排。

PerfectNetExp.abs: after a punishing year last year , investors are more interested in finding out about hedge funds' risk than their performance by a margin of three to one , the respondents said .受访者表示，经过去年惩罚性的一年之后，投资者对于发现对冲基金风险的兴趣，是对其业绩兴趣的3倍。
the president , to be on a punishing new diet and exercise regime , had gone a midday run in high temperatures , and collapsed at around 1.30pm.据说总统采用了一种颇费体能的新型疗法，集饮食锻炼于一体，他在中午顶着高温去跑步，下午1点30分就晕倒了。
Appeal to Stop Enriching Uranium ... 1 Representatives： n. 代表 3 punishing： adj. 累人的 2 suspend： vt. 吊, 悬挂.
Bush, Democrats Continue Election-Year... ... federal 联邦的 punishing 辛苦的 accusation 责备.

二十八星宿_互动百科 ... 键闭 Door bolt 罚（punishment） Punishment 东咸 Eastern door.
字典中辜字的解释 ... (5) 通“故”( gù)。原故,原因[ reason;cause] (1) 惩罚,治罪[ punish] (2) 肢解,分裂肢体[ dismember].
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... publish 出版，刊印；公布，发表 punish 惩罚，处罚 pupil 学生，小学生；瞳孔.
狮门电影公司_百度百科 ... 110.红色之州 Red State 2. 惩罚者（punisher）：战争特区 Punisher:War Zone 3. 爸爸的女儿 Daddy's Little Girls.

entry.def: A punishing schedule, activity, or experience requires a lot of physical effort and makes you very tired or weak.

example.ex: He claimed his punishing work schedule had made him resort to taking the drug...
example.tran: 他声称繁重的工作安排使他不得不依靠服药来维持精力。

example.ex: Besides diets, he devised punishing exercise routines.
example.tran: 除了节制饮食，他还设计了魔鬼健身计划。

means.word_mean: 2. characterized by toilsome effort to the point of exhaustion; especially physical effort;

sentences.sentence: "worked their arduous way up the mining valley"
"spent many laborious hours on the project"

auth_sentence.content: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.
auth_sentence.res_content: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The dairy industry is really punishing on its animals.

auth_sentence.content: Punishing innocent children widely considered a seriously immoral act.
auth_sentence.res_content: Punishing innocent children widely considered a seriously immoral act.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Punishing innocent children widely considered a seriously immoral act.

auth_sentence.content: If the regimen sounds punishing, don't despair.
auth_sentence.res_content: If the regimen sounds punishing, don't despair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If the regimen sounds punishing, don't despair.
